```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
	echo = FALSE,
	eval=FALSE,
	message = FALSE,
	warning = FALSE
)

source("../scripts/source_files.R")

case_detail_cols <- c("district_code", "district_name", "state_code", "state_name", "complex_code", "court_name", "est_code", "cino", "case_no", "fil_no", "fil_year", "reg_no", "reg_year", "type_name", "date_of_decision", "date_of_filing", "dt_regis", "disp_name", "disp_nature")
```


```{r case_numbers_disposal_patterns}
case_numbers_disposal <- dbxSelect(
  con,
  glue('select {paste0(case_detail_cols,collapse = ",")} from case_details where disp_name IN ({paste0("\\\'",case_disposal_patterns_case_age,"\\\'",collapse = ",")})')
)
```

```{r Writing Files}
# On 02/06/20
write_csv(case_numbers_disposal,"datasets/case_patterns/case_disposal_patterns.csv")
```
